alert.note: Alert for Orange (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued March 02 at 3:47PM EST until March 04 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Southern Indiana and north central Kentucky. * WHEN...Tonight through Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Moderate to heavy rainfall late tonight and Friday morning. Rainfall totals of 2 to 4 inches with locally higher amounts. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
